title: Covid-19 Detection
description: This project, executed in Python and employing six cutting-edge deep learning models, while making a significant impact by contributing to the field of health care and COVID-19 detection through chest X-rays analysis.

title: Seat Belt Detection
description: This project is a Python-driven venture employing OpenCV, dedicated to enhancing safety through seatbelt detection, fusing coding proficiency with computer vision to enhance road safety in the digital era.

title: Voice Control WheelChair
description: This project is a C-programmed venture, involves creating a voice-controlled wheelchair to enhance safety and facilitate easy handling for individuals with disabilities.
